.@SAMHSAgov provides 24/7, 365-day-a-year crisis counseling and support to people experiencing emotional distress related to natural or human-caused disasters. Call: 1-800-985-5990 or text TalkWithUs to 66746 to connect with a trained crisis counselor: https://t.co/0D6mtZn2iP

Coping with stress will make you, the people you care about, and your community stronger. As I continue to work with my colleagues to fight for funding for expanded mental health services during this time of crisis, resources are available if you or your loved ones need help:

The coronavirus (COVID-19) public health emergency can take its toll on our mental well-being and may be stressful for people. There is no shame in this at all. Fear and anxiety about a disease can be overwhelming and cause strong emotions in adults and children.
